ar:
أنشئ روتين تحسين مخصص بتنسيق JSON محسّن للعرض في التقويم/الجدول الزمني. اتبع هذه المتطلبات:

1. **متطلبات البنية:**
{
  "daily_schedule": [
    {
      "time_slot": "الصباح/الظهيرة/المساء/الليل",
      "start_time": "HH:MM", // الوقت المثالي المُقدَّر
      "actions": [
        {
          "id": "معرّف فريد",
          "title": "اسم النشاط",
          "duration": X, // بالدقائق
          "category": "بدني|عناية بالبشرة|نفسي|إلخ.",
          "startDate":"YYYY-MM-DD",
          "endDate":"YYYY-MM-DD",
          "frequency": ["الاثنين","الثلاثاء","الأربعاء","الخميس","الجمعة","السبت","الأحد"],
          "recurring": true/false,
          "priority": "عالية/متوسطة/منخفضة",
          "description": "تعليمات خطوة بخطوة",
          "prep_needed": true/false,
          "location": "المنزل/النادي/المكتب/إلخ."
        }
      ]
    }
  ],
  "weekly_goals": [
    {
      "id": "معرّف فريد",
      "title": "اسم الهدف",
      "type": "اجتماعي|لياقة|مهارة|إلخ.",
      "frequency": "أسبوعي/كل أسبوعين",
      "best_day": "الاثنين - الجمعة",
      "duration": X, // دقائق
      "time_of_day": "صباح/ظهيرة/مساء"
    }
  ],
  "preparation_list": [
    {
      "id": "معرّف فريد",
      "task": "عنصر للتحضير أو الشراء",
      "category": "تسوق/بحث/تجهيز",
      "deadline": "YYYY-MM-DD",
      "urgency": "عالية/متوسطة/منخفضة"
    }
  ],
  "progress_milestones": [
    {
      "id": "معرّف فريد",
      "title": "اسم المرحلة",
      "target_date": "YYYY-MM-DD",
      "success_metrics": ["مقياس 1", "مقياس 2"]
    }
  ]
}

2. **عوامل التخصيص الأساسية:**
- العمر: ${userInfo.birthDate}
- المهنة: ${userInfo.job} (تأخذ بعين الاعتبار التنقل وساعات العمل)
- جدول اللياقة الحالي: ${userInfo.workoutSchedule}
- الملاحظات أو التفضيلات: ${userInfo.notes}
- الهوايات: ${userInfo.hobbies}
- الهدف الشخصي: ${userInfo.goals}
- الجنس: ${userInfo.gender}
- الأوقات المتاحة: {حسب العمل}
- الميزانية: {تقدير بناءً على الوظيفة}

3. **قواعد الجدولة:**
- لا يتم إدخال أكثر من عادتين جديدتين في الأسبوع
- 30 دقيقة على الأقل كفاصل بين العمل والأنشطة الذاتية
- الحد الأقصى للروتين الصباحي 45 دقيقة
- الحد الأقصى للروتين المسائي ساعة واحدة
- يجب أن تتماشى الأهداف الأسبوعية مع أيام الراحة
- تطبيق التحميل التدريجي في أهداف اللياقة

4. **متطلبات الإخراج:**
- يجب أن تحتوي كل فترة على وقت بداية واضح مع رمز تعبيري مرتبط
- المدة بالدقائق الصحيحة فقط
- تحديد مكان النشاط
- توضيح المستلزمات المسبقة
- إضافة نقاط تتبع التقدم
- الإشارة إلى أي تعارض مع أوقات العمل
- إدراج أنشطة بديلة للأيام السيئة
- ترتيب الفترات: صباح > ظهيرة > مساء > ليل

5. **تعليمات خاصة:**
- يُفترض أن المستخدم يستيقظ في {حسب الوظيفة}
- الأولوية للأنشطة المنزلية في أول أسبوعين
- اقتراح مقاطع يوتيوب محددة للتمارين
- توصية بمنتجات محددة للعناية بالبشرة من كوريا (ليس من شركة COSRX ولا من شركات تدعم إسرائيل)
- إضافة 5 دقائق كفاصل بين الأنشطة المتتالية
- الأنشطة تبدأ من ${DateTime.now()} وتمتد لثلاثة أشهر، مع تحديد تاريخ البداية والنهاية
- تأكد من أن استجابة JSON منسقة بشكل صحيح
يركز الناتج على تقديم جدول تنفيذي ومحدد زمنيًا وليس نصائح عامة.
en:
Generate a personalized glow-up routine in JSON format optimized for calendar/schedule display. Follow these requirements:

1. **Structure Requirements:**
{
  "daily_schedule": [
    {
      "time_slot": "Morning/Afternoon/Evening/Night",
      "start_time": "HH:MM", // Estimated ideal time
      "actions": [
        {
          "id": "unique-id",
          "title": "Action name",
          "duration": X, // Minutes
          "category": "Physical|Skincare|Mental|etc.",
          "startDate":"YYYY-MM-DD",
          "endDate":"YYYY-MM-DD",
          "frequency": ["Mon","Tue","Wed","Thu","Fri","Sat","Sun"], // Days
          "recurring": true/false,
          "priority": "High/Medium/Low",
          "description": "Step-by-step instructions",
          "prep_needed": true/false,
          "location": "Home/Gym/Office/etc.",
      
        }
      ]
    }
  ],
  "weekly_goals": [
    {
      "id": "unique-id",
      "title": "Goal name",
      "type": "Social|Fitness|Skill|etc.",
      "frequency": "Weekly/Bi-weekly",
      "best_day": "Monday-Friday",
      "duration": X, // Minutes
      "time_of_day": "Morning/Afternoon/Evening"
    }
  ],
  "preparation_list": [
    {
      "id": "unique-id",
      "task": "Item to acquire/prepare",
      "category": "Shopping/Research/Setup",
      "deadline": "YYYY-MM-DD",
      "urgency": "High/Medium/Low"
    }
  ],
  "progress_milestones": [
    {
      "id": "unique-id",
      "title": "Milestone name",
      "target_date": "YYYY-MM-DD",
      "success_metrics": ["metric1", "metric2"]
    }
  ]
}

2. **Key Personalization Factors:**
- Age: ${userInfo.birthDate}
- Occupation: ${userInfo.job} (consider commute/working hours)
- Current fitness schedule: ${userInfo.workoutSchedule}
- Style preferences/note to consider: ${userInfo.notes}
- hobbies: ${userInfo.hobbies}
- personal goal: ${userInfo.goals}
- gender: ${userInfo.gender}
- Available time slots: {calculate_free_time_based_on_job}
- Budget: {estimate_based_on_occupation}

3. **Scheduling Rules:**
- Never schedule more than 2 new habits per week
- Minimum 30 minutes buffer between work-related and self-care activities
- Morning routines max 45 minutes
- Evening routines max 1 hour
- Weekly goals should align with days off work when possible
- Include progressive overload for fitness goals

4. **Output Requirements:**
- All time slots must have concrete start times add related emoji to time_slot
- Duration in whole minutes only
- Include location requirements
- Specify needed preparation items
- Add progress checkpoints
- Flag conflicts with typical work hours
- Include alternate actions for bad days
-organize time slot by order> morning> afternoon> evening > night 

5. **Special Instructions:**
- Assume user wakes up at {calculate_wakeup_time_based_on_job}
- Prioritize home-based activities for first 2 weeks
- Suggest specific YouTube workout videos when relevant
- Recommend exact product names for skincare don't recommend product from companies that support israel, recommend korean skin care but not from COSRX company
- Include 5-minute buffer between consecutive tasks
-the actions starts from ${DateTime.now()} to 3 months add the start date and end date form actions accordingly
-make sure the json response in correctly formatted 
Focus on creating a time-bound, executable schedule rather than general advice. The output should be ready for direct import into a digital calendar.''';
}

String actionUpdatePrompt({required ScheduleAction action}) {
  return '''
Update the following action by filling missing fields based on existing schedule context.
Return  the updated action and timeSlot in valid JSON format without any additional text or explanations.

Original action:
${action.toJson()}

Update rules:
1. Preserve existing values unless they're null/empty
2. Add realistic duration based on action type duration type is int in Minutes
3. Set appropriate category if missing
4. Generate sensible description if empty
5. Add recurrence rules if relevant
6. Never modify 'instances' field
7. Ensure all dates are in ISO 8601 format
8. add slot that matches the action
9. if action is not recurring create an action instance and set date property to ${DateTime.now()} it should look like {'id':'unique-id','date':'','status':'todo'}
match the types in the original glow up response 
the returned response should look like :
{
"action":${action.toJson()},//updated action
"slot":"Morning/Afternoon/Evening/Night"
}
tr:
'''
Takvim/plan görünümüne uygun şekilde optimize edilmiş, kişiselleştirilmiş bir glow-up rutini JSON formatında oluştur. Şu gereksinimlere uy:

1. **Yapı Gereksinimleri:**
{
  "daily_schedule": [
    {
      "time_slot": "Sabah/Öğlen/Akşam/Gece",
      "start_time": "HH:MM", // Tahmini ideal zaman
      "actions": [
        {
          "id": "benzersiz-id",
          "title": "Eylem adı",
          "duration": X, // Dakika
          "category": "Fiziksel|Cilt Bakımı|Zihinsel|vb.",
          "startDate":"YYYY-MM-DD",
          "endDate":"YYYY-MM-DD",
          "frequency": ["Pzt","Sal","Çar","Per","Cum","Cmt","Paz"],
          "recurring": true/false,
          "priority": "Yüksek/Orta/Düşük",
          "description": "Adım adım talimatlar",
          "prep_needed": true/false,
          "location": "Ev/Spor Salonu/Ofis/vb."
        }
      ]
    }
  ],
  "weekly_goals": [
    {
      "id": "benzersiz-id",
      "title": "Hedef adı",
      "type": "Sosyal|Fitness|Beceri|vb.",
      "frequency": "Haftalık/İki haftada bir",
      "best_day": "Pazartesi-Cuma",
      "duration": X,
      "time_of_day": "Sabah/Öğlen/Akşam"
    }
  ],
  "preparation_list": [
    {
      "id": "benzersiz-id",
      "task": "Hazırlanacak/temin edilecek şey",
      "category": "Alışveriş/Araştırma/Kurulum",
      "deadline": "YYYY-MM-DD",
      "urgency": "Yüksek/Orta/Düşük"
    }
  ],
  "progress_milestones": [
    {
      "id": "benzersiz-id",
      "title": "Kilometre taşı",
      "target_date": "YYYY-MM-DD",
      "success_metrics": ["ölçüt1", "ölçüt2"]
    }
  ]
}

2. **Kişiselleştirme Faktörleri:**
- Yaş: ${userInfo.birthDate}
- Meslek: ${userInfo.job} (iş saati/ulaşım dikkate alınır)
- Mevcut spor planı: ${userInfo.workoutSchedule}
- Tarz tercihi/notlar: ${userInfo.notes}
- Hobiler: ${userInfo.hobbies}
- Kişisel hedef: ${userInfo.goals}
- Cinsiyet: ${userInfo.gender}
- Uygun zaman: {işe göre hesapla}
- Bütçe: {mesleğe göre tahminle}

3. **Planlama Kuralları:**
- Haftada en fazla 2 yeni alışkanlık
- İş ve kişisel bakım arasında en az 30 dakika boşluk
- Sabah rutini en fazla 45 dakika
- Akşam rutini en fazla 1 saat
- Haftalık hedefler izin günlerine denk gelmeli
- Spor hedeflerinde kademeli artış (progressive overload)

4. **Çıktı Gereksinimleri:**
- Zaman dilimi net başlama saati ve emoji içermeli
- Süre sadece tam dakikalar
- Mekan belirtilmeli
- Hazırlık öğeleri listelenmeli
- İlerleme kontrol noktaları dahil edilmeli
- İş saatleriyle çakışmalar işaretlenmeli
- Kötü günler için alternatif eylemler önerilmeli
- Sıralama: sabah > öğlen > akşam > gece

5. **Özel Talimatlar:**
- Kullanıcının uyanma saati {mesleğe göre hesapla}
- İlk 2 hafta evde yapılabilecek etkinlikler öner
- Gerekirse belirli YouTube egzersiz videoları öner
- İsrail’i destekleyen markalar hariç, Kore cilt bakım ürünleri öner (COSRX hariç)
- Tüm görevler arasında 5 dakika boşluk bırak
- Eylemler ${DateTime.now()} itibarıyla başlar ve 3 ay sürer
- JSON çıktısı doğru formatta olmalı
Genel tavsiye değil, zaman odaklı ve uygulanabilir bir plan üret.
'''
